100 Years of Stafford Beer

Celebrating his Legacy and Future Developments

September 17-19, 2026

Alliance Manchester Business School, Manchester

Registration Information About the Conference

A Global Centenary Celebration

On 25 September 2026, Stafford Beer, the Father of Organisational Cybernetics, would have turned 100. To mark this milestone, the Metaphorum Cooperative is leading a global centenary celebration of his life and his contributions to science, business, and society.

Conference Highlights

  • Documentary Screening: ‘100 Years of Stafford Beer’
  • Festschrift Book Launch: Summarizing Stafford’s legacy
  • Journal Launch: Metaphorum Journal ‘Organisational Systems’
  • Creative Contributions: Music, poetry, and arts

Hosted At

Alliance Manchester Business School (AMBS)

In collaboration with the World Organization for Systems and Cybernetics (WOSC) and the Centre for Systems Studies (University of Hull).

View Venue & Travel Info →

Key Dates

Registration Opens January 2026
Conference Sept 17-19, 2026
Stafford's 100th Birthday Sept 25, 2026
